name: ext_R4_DeviceDefinition
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.DeviceDefinition for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents DeviceDefinition from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceDefinition|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R2.

element.short: An instance of a medical-related component of a medical device
element.definition: The characteristics, operational status and capabilities of a medical-related component of a medical device.
